snippet: The Brits Off Broadway festival brings a double bill of “A Respectable Widow Takes to Vulgarity” and “Clean” to 59E59 Theaters.
abstract: Laura Collins-Hughes reviews Douglas Maxwell play A Respectable Widow Takes to Vulgarity and Sabrina Mahfouz play Clean, double bill directed by Orla O'Loughlin; plays are presented by Traverse Theater Company of Edinburgh at 59E59 Theaters as part of Brits Off Broadway festival.
lead_paragraph: The Brits Off Broadway festival brings a double bill of “A Respectable Widow Takes to Vulgarity” and “Clean” to 59E59 Theaters.

headline.seo: ‘A Respectable Widow,’ About an Unusual Friendship
headline.main: What a Foul Mouth You Have, Grandma
